subject: Fwd: Triskelion Fulgerites
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi all,

someone sent me this - perhaps it's of use for some of you...

Stefan

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Dear Sirs, triskelion fulgerites are spheres of fused glass with three
trilatereal roots, formed when lightning bolts hit the sands of the
beaches of Florida, where there are more lightning strikes than anywhere
else on Earth. You should experiment with these items, incorporate them
into your EVP gear, play around with the + and - and ground electrical
links on its roots, and see if these items can be utilized as both
antenna or a microphone voice transmission diodes, to see if it will
enable you to talk to ghosts CLEARLY. These items are pieces oc chaos
theory made manifest, and only the massive energy of a thunderbolt
grounding itself can create them. They cannot be made in the lab. That
covers it.
